name: Galaxy Shooter (aberlow)
description:
This is a slightly tweaked version of a space-shooter game I made as part of my Unity education. Currently in version 1.0, but I will be updating over time to include more features, so check back occasionally! 

Happy to have constructive input as I move it forward and build on basic programming concepts. 

Concepts covered:

Variables, Prefabs, Data Persistence using Singleton Pattern, Animations, Sound FX, basic UI, Saving data with PlayerPrefs.
